# UIAccessibilityNavigationStyle.automatic

**Case**

The assistive technology automatically determines how the receiver’s elements should be navigated.

## Declaration

```swift
case automatic
```

## Discussion

This is the default value.

## Constants

- **UIAccessibilityNavigationStyle.separate**: The receiver’s elements should be navigated as separate elements.
- **UIAccessibilityNavigationStyle.combined**: The receiver’s elements should be combined and navigated as a single item.

items.description: The receiver’s elements should be navigated as separate elements.

items.description: The receiver’s elements should be combined and navigated as a single item.
